attributes.action: insist upon URGENT improvements on London Midland Rail Service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After months of continuous delays I think it is now the time to get the voices of the customers heard by Senior Management:

- Regular cancelled services
- Constant delays
- Ad-hoc reduction of train size and consequent over-crowding
- Insufficient volume of trains at smaller stations
- Continual spouting about 'new and improved' service yet no evidence of this

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "insist upon URGENT improvements on London Midland Rail Service."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18958


Prime Minister's Office
